grid.sql: SELECT qryReport.rekv_id, qryReport.tunnus, qryReport.tegev, qryReport.allikas, qryReport.artikkel, qryReport.eelarve_kinnitatud, qryReport.eelarve_tapsustatud, qryReport.taitmine_kassa, qryReport.taitmine_tekke, a.nimetus :: VARCHAR(254) as nimetus, r.nimetus:: VARCHAR(254) as asutus, qryReport.is_kulud::INTEGER as is_kulud FROM eelarve.eelarve_kassa_tekkepohine_taitmine($1::date, $2::integer, $3::integer) qryReport LEFT OUTER JOIN com_artikkel a ON a.kood :: TEXT = qryReport.artikkel :: TEXT INNER JOIN ou.rekv r on r.id = qryReport.rekv_id ORDER BY qryReport.is_kulud, r.parentid, r.nimetus, qryReport.allikas, qryReport.tegev, qryReport.artikkel
